mapper.select: select tl.id, tl.date, tl.location, tl.start_time, tl.end_time, tl.curr_customer_num as currNum, tl.gmt_modified as gmtModified, tl.gmt_create as gmtCreate, course.name as courseName, course.id as courseId from trial_lesson tl left join course on tl.course_id = course.id where tl.id = #{id}
